SEARCH
Package football

Class Player

java.lang.Object
football.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
Defender, Forward, Goalkeeper, Midfielder
public abstract class Player extends Object
Class representing the player in a game. This class contains player's stats, his attributes, name, the value of his stamina, his current place, ball possession. There are 4 classes which extends Player, they are: Goalkeeper, Defender, Midfielder, Forward

Attributes:

  • stats: individual stats of the player
  • team_stats: team stats of the team player belongs to
  • attributes: player's attributes
  • name: player's name
  • surname: player's surname
  • stamina: value of player's stamina (100 is full stamina)
  • place: the area where player is
  • ball_possessed: whether the player possesses the ball or no
  • team_number: the number of the team player belongs to
  • mentality: mentality of the player(common for players from the same team)
  • motivation: motivation of the player(common for players from the same team)

    • Player

      public Player(String name, String surname, int side, int shooting, int dribbling, int passing, int defending, int aggression, int goalkeeping, int team_number, StatsTeam team_stats, int mentality, int motivation)
      Constructor of class Player with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      name - name of the player
      surname - surname of the player
      side - the side of the player; left(1), center(2) or right(3)
      shooting - the shooting ability of the player
      dribbling - the dribbling ability of the player
      passing - the passing ability of the player
      defending - the defending ability of the player
      aggression - the aggression of the player
      goalkeeping - the goalkeeping ability of the player
      team_number - the number of the team player belongs to
      team_stats - the stats of the team player belongs to
      mentality - the mentality of the player
      motivation - the motivation of the player

  • Method Details

    • decision_ball

      public abstract int decision_ball(Pitch pitch, Ball ball, Team team, int event, double con, int rain)
      The abstract method decision_ball. Makes decision when player owns the ball. The decision-making depend on player's position (other for goalkeepers, defenders etc.)
      Parameters:
      pitch - the pitch of the game
      ball - the ball
      team - the team of the player who makes a decision
      event - the event
      con - the condition modifier
      rain - the rain modifier
      Returns:
      new event which will happen

    • decision_no_ball

      public int decision_no_ball(int event, Team team, Ball ball, double con, int referee, int rain)
      The method decision_no_ball. Makes decision when player doesn't own the ball. Player might try to tackle a ball from an opponent or take over the ball, when the other team lost it. Player's decision depends on the current place on the pitch of the player.
      Parameters:
      event - the event
      team - the team of the player who makes a decision
      ball - the ball
      con - the condition modifier
      referee - the severity of the referee
      rain - the rain modifier
      Returns:
      new event which will happen

    • getPlace

      public Field getPlace()

    • setPlace

      public void setPlace(Pitch pitch, int width, int length)

    • player_moving

      public void player_moving(Pitch pitch, int ball_X, int ball_Y, int ball_team, double con)
      The method player_moving moves the player who doesn't have the ball. The movement depends on: - player's position - player's current place - ball's current place - team which possesses the ball Movement in X-coordinates is common for all players. Movement in Y-coordinates depends on player's position. Movement decreases player's stamina. The loss of stamina is higher when player's team don't have the ball.
      Parameters:
      pitch - the pitch of the game
      ball_X - ball X-coordinate
      ball_Y - ball Y-coordinate
      ball_team - team which owns the ball
      con - condition modifier

    • player_get_ball

      public void player_get_ball(boolean ball_possessed)
      Method player_get_ball sets if the player has the ball.
      Parameters:
      ball_possessed - true=has ball, false=doesn't have ball

    • player_shooting

      public int player_shooting(Ball ball, int event, double con, int rain)
      The method player_shooting makes player shoots. Shot might be either on-target or missed. The success of making a shot-on-target depends on: - player's shooting ability - place where he shoots from - player's stamina - player's motivation - weather (rain) If players misses, the game will be resumed by enemy goalkeeper. If the shoot is on target, enemy goalkeeper needs to save it.
      Parameters:
      ball - the ball
      event - the event
      con - condition modifier
      rain - rain modifier
      Returns:
      new event which will happen

    • recipient

      public Player recipient(Team team)
      Method recipient chooses the recipient of the pass. It divides players from the same team into few pots depending on their distance from the football.Player. It's more likely to choose a recipient who is closer to the player.
      Parameters:
      team - team of the player
      Returns:
      the recipient of the pass

    • player_passing

      public int player_passing(Player recipient, Ball ball, int event, double con, int rain)
      The method player_passing makes player pass. The pass may be successful, missed or off-side. The success of making an accurate pass depends on: - player's passing ability - place where he passes from - player's stamina - player's motivation - weather (rain) When the pass is successful, the recipient gets the ball. When it's missed, an opponent takes over the ball.
      Parameters:
      recipient - the player who is recipient of the pass
      ball - the ball
      event - the event
      con - condition modifier
      rain - rain modifier
      Returns:
      new event which will happen

    • player_dribbling

      public void player_dribbling(Pitch pitch, Ball ball, double con)
      Method player_dribbling makes player with the ball dribbles. Player can dribble without changing his field, or he can dribble into neighboring field. Dribbling causes big loss of stamina.
      Parameters:
      pitch - pitch of the game
      ball - ball
      con - condition modifier

    • player_tackling

      public int player_tackling(Player opponent, Ball ball, int event, double con, int referee, int rain)
      Method player_tackling makes player tackle. Tackle might be successful or unsuccessful. Unsuccessful tackle might result in foul. The success of tackle depends on: - player's defending ability - opponent's dribbling ability - player's and opponent's stamina - player's and opponent's motivation - place where the player tries to tackle - weather (rain) If the tackle was not successful, it might result in foul, and even in yellow or red card. It depends on: - player's aggression - referee's severity - weather (rain) Tackling decreases player's stamina. If foul occurred, also opponent's stamina is decreased.
      Parameters:
      opponent - the player who owns the ball
      ball - the ball
      event - the event
      con - condition modifier
      referee - the severity of the referee
      rain - rain modifier
      Returns:
      new event which will happen

    • player_intercepting

      public int player_intercepting(Ball ball, int event, double con)
      Method player_intercepting makes player take over the ball, when nobody owns it.
      Parameters:
      ball - the ball
      event - the event
      con - condition modifier
      Returns:
      the event that will happen, here it's always the normal game

    • player_penalty

      public int player_penalty(Ball ball, int event, double con, int rain)
      Method player_penalty makes player take a penalty. It's simple shoot, but it's more possible to score.
      Parameters:
      ball - the ball
      event - the event
      rain - rain modifier
      Returns:
      it returns the event that will happen, here shoot on-target or missed shoot

    • player_freekick

      public int player_freekick(Ball ball, int event, Team team, double con, int rain)
      Method player_freekick makes player take a free kick. It can be either pass or shoot.
      Parameters:
      ball - the ball
      event - the event
      team - the team
      con - condition modifier
      rain - rain modifier
      Returns:
      the event that will happen
